input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
Cat Tree 47" Level Condo Furniture Scratching Post Pet House Brown Scratcher Black

Product keywords:
Board Material: Wood
Covering Material: Carpet | Color: Black
Very easy to assemble | Step by step instructions and tools are included.
Overall Dimension: 47 " H x 23 1/2" L x 15 1/2" W
Shipping weight: 28 LBS
input_text.Response A: This Cat Tree 47" Level Condo Furniture Scratching Post Pet House Brown Scratcher Black is made of high-quality wood and carpet material to provide your cat with a comfortable and safe place to play and scratch. It is designed with multiple levels and platforms, allowing your cat to climb and explore to their heart's content. The scratching post is wrapped in black carpet, providing your cat with a natural scratching surface. The overall dimension of this cat tree is 47" H x 23 1/2" L x 15 1/2" W, and it weighs 28 pounds. This cat tree is easy to assemble with step-by-step instructions and tools included.
input_text.Response B: This periodic beer glass and caffeine molecule mug set is perfect for every day, whether you're having coffee in the morning or beer at night. Nerd out with this awesome drinkware!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
